fields.documentation: The type of this interval how it will add accounting.
fields.name: interval

fields.documentation: Start date when the interval have the first accounting.
fields.name: date_start

fields.documentation: Last date where the interval is active. This must not match the last accounting date.
fields.name: date_end

fields.documentation: Until this date all accounting which belong to this interval are created or updated.
fields.name: date_updated_until
